name: Beautiful sandhill ? Let's go to Yogyakarta Indonesia
description: The sandhill is located next to Parangkusumo beach. The sand is natural phenomenon and frkm the beach near it. There are litle road about 3 kilometers which we pass the sand hill. People usualy take pictures or prewedding. You may want to try sandboarding. Local people provide the tools. It is only two in the world, in Indonesia and Mexico. The difference is black sand. Parangkusomo has black and smooth sand. It really different with the other sand hill. A desert is near from beach and the other object. It needs 44 minutes from Yogyakarta, so many tourist don't know this object.
